web_snippets: Ron Capps (born June 20, 1965) is an American NHRA Funny Car racer who owns and drives the NAPA Auto Parts Toyota Supra.
Brother Jon Capps of Las Vegas is a part-time Funny Car driver in NHRA. News. Ron Capps to race in Celebrity All-Star Midget event in Indy · Funny Car veteran ...
Established in 2021, Ron Capps Motorsports is a single-car NHRA Funny Car team owned and operated by reigning and three-time world champion Ron Capps.
